About Us
Established in 2020, Kamcon Eye Clinic Opened her offices to the general public in 2023.

We are your leading destination for comprehensive eye care and vision solutions. We are dedicated to providing exceptional eye health services and personalized care to our valued patients. With a team of highly skilled optometrists, and support staff, we strive to deliver the highest standard of eye care in a warm and welcoming environment.

At KAMCON Eye care, we believe in investing in the latest advancements in eye care technology. We are equipped with modern age diagnostic tools and treatment equipment, allowing us to accurately assess and manage a wide range of eye conditions. From advanced imaging systems to computer-assisted platforms, we leverage these resources to deliver precise diagnoses and tailored treatment plans
